1: <mistake>@//chu</mistake> dang sa dang <mistake>btan</mistake> dang g.yo ba <mistake>dang// lha</mistake> ni mthong ba skyed min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa <mistake>do</mistake> <mistake>rjeyi</mistake> ni lus dag <mistake>las//sngags</mistake> kyi skye gnas dag ni <mistake>'byud</mistake> bar 'gyur
2: zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol <mistake>te//de</mistake> ltar gang gis <mistake>yangdg</mistake> rig <mistake>pa</mistake> de ni phyugs min sems kyis kun tu rtog pa dag las <mistake>grol/g</mistake> g.yon gyi yan lag tu <mistake>ni</mistake> dkar po <mistake>'barba</mistake>
3: 'gro ba'i bdud <mistake>rtsi'i</mistake> cha dang g.yas su dmar <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>mdog /sgra</mistake> gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma'i ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma <mistake>dang//'jug</mistake> rings dman pa char dang <mistake>blog</mistake> dang chu dang rtse mo can
4: te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun <mistake>po// 'jig</mistake> rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' <mistake>la'o//rgyab</mistake> tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha <mistake>gzhus</mistake> ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis
5: kyi dbye bas <mistake>so//srog</mistake> ces bya ba gcig <mistake>bu'i</mistake> rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te <mistake>skyi</mistake> bo <mistake>rtsa ba</mistake> dag dang mdun <mistake>du'o//dbus</mistake> kyi rdo <mistake>rje'i</mistake> steng du <mistake>s</mistake> <mistake>pon</mistake> rang gi nus pa yon ta na tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu
6: <mistake>gnas//kun</mistake> tu ye shes dang ni stong <mistake>pa'o</mistake> zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par <mistake>grol/4/a</mistake> sogs sum <mistake>cu'i</mistake> dbyangs <mistake>gang</mistake> ha ya ra <mistake>la</mistake> lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed
7: <mistake>kyang//ga</mistake> sogs pa'i sde rnams <mistake>dbyangs</mistake> dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis sbyod par <mistake>byed//ha</mistake> <mistake>sogs</mistake> dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha mi <mistake>gdengs</mistake> can 'byung <mistake>po'i</mistake> skye gnas
8: dag kyang sngags shes <mistake>pa//a</mistake> sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges <mistake>panrg</mistake> bskyed 'gyur mi yi bdag / dbyangs ni ka <mistake>+tsa</mistake> <mistake>Ta</mistake> pa <mistake>tang</mistake> ldan <mistake>r+a</mistake> la sogs pa yang dag sbyar
